statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, humidity, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT date, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE rainfall > 5.0 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT temperature, rainfall, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 70 AND wind_speed > 10.0
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25.0 AND 30.0 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 80 AND rainfall < 2.0 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city='New York'
SELECT city, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_yield WHERE date='2022-08-15'
SELECT * FROM crop_yield WHERE temperature_requirement < 30 AND humidity_requirement > 60
SELECT city, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE date='2022-08-20'
SELECT city, date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city, date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city, date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND temperature < 20 AND humidity > 80 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT city, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity, MAX(precipitation) AS max_precipitation FROM weather_data GROUP BY city HAVING avg_temp > 20 AND max_precipitation < 5 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM CropData ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, estimated_yield, harvest_date FROM CropData WHERE estimated_yield > 1000 ORDER BY estimated_yield DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, crop_name, predicted_yield FROM YieldAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY planting_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date, estimated_yield FROM CropData WHERE estimated_yield > 1000 ORDER BY estimated_yield DESC
SELECT analysis_id, crop_name, analysis_date, predicted_yield FROM YieldAnalysis WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat'
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM crop_data ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT location, ph_level FROM soil_data WHERE ph_level < 6.5;
SELECT crop_id, prediction_date, predicted_yield FROM yield_predictions WHERE predicted_yield > 1000 ORDER BY predicted_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, prediction_date, predicted_yield FROM yield_predictions ORDER BY predicted_yield DESC;
SELECT location, ph_level, nutrient_levels FROM soil_data WHERE location LIKE '%farm%' ORDER BY ph_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM Weather_Data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM Crop_Data ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT location, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM Soil_Data WHERE potassium_level < 0.5;
SELECT date, actual_yield FROM Prediction WHERE predicted_yield > actual_yield;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Data
SELECT location, temperature FROM Weather_Data WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT * FROM Soil_Data ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC
SELECT location, field_area FROM Field_Data WHERE field_area > 10 ORDER BY location
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date, yield_estimate FROM Crop_Data WHERE yield_estimate > 1000
